entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
